title: Screen Tearing?
body: I have been getting  a lot of screen tearing, does anyone know how to fix it?

replies.body:
Capping your frames to match the refresh rate of your display (60Hz = 60FPS Cap) and enabling vertical sync typically resolves this, though it depends on the system. You can find these settings under **VIDEO** in your in-game League settings.

(Click to Enlarge)

http://imgur.com/a/Fy9s8

Let me know if this helped.
Have you turned on v-sync via the in-game settings?
